```{r}
setwd("~/Dropbox/Projects/PROSPECT Study 20160610/Work/Data/hiv.prospect/data")
library(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv("2019-03-12_outcomes_hiv.prospect.csv")

df <- df %>%
  mutate(group = factor(group))

df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=sex, y=value, fill=outcome)) +
  geom_bar(position="fill", stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(fct_relevel(group,
                         "Cough", "Fever", "Night sweats", "Weight loss","Chronic cough",
                         "Any TB symptom", "No cough", "No fever", "No night sweats", 
                         "No weight loss", "No chronic cough", "No TB symptoms")
             ~., ncol=6) +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_fill_brewer() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format()) +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())

ggsave("2019-03-12_hivtestoutcome_hiv.prosepct.png", dpi=600, width=10, height=8)
```
